E-Baltab

API Ebaltab adalah api untuk mengakses informasi riwayat hidup prajurit TNI

Dokumentasi

Versi
Versi Tanggal Perubahan
versi 1 04/10/2021 Initial deployment
Endpoints
Endpoint Kegunaan
/baltab/sanbox/calldatakeluar Return data sandbox riwayat hidup prajurit baltab

Required Parameter

Example API Fields
Parameter Deskripsi Tipe Data
TOKEN Token untuk access API string 
                        
                            "0": {
        
                          "atas_nama": "AGS",
                            "jumlah": "3213213",
                            "total_bulan": "12",
                            "nama_bank": "BRI",
                            "no_rekening": "4324244",
                            "data_prajurit": {
                                "nama_prajurit": "Agus",
                                "nrp": "333",
                                "tanggal pensiun": "2034-08-13"
                            }
                           },

Note: On Sandbox, Midtrans uses web-based payment simulator. So, payment that requires app deeplink like GoPay, will use web simulator instead of real app deeplink. To test real app deeplink use cases, please use Midtrans

Input Value
Expiry Month 01 (or any month)
Expiry Year 2025 (or any future year)
CVV 123
OTP/3DS 112233
Card Number Refer to table given below.
Visa Description
